LSTM.from sentence: LSTM : This is the basic LSTM - based deletion method proposed by .

LSTM +.from sentence: LSTM + : This is advanced version of the model proposed by , where the authors incorporated some dependency parse tree information into the LSTM model and used the prediction on the previous word to help the prediction on the current word .

Traditional ILP.from sentence:
Traditional ILP :
This is the ILP - based method proposed by .

Abstractive seq2seq.from sentence:
Abstractive seq2seq :
This is an abstractive sequence - to - sequence model trained on 3.8 million Gigaword title - article pairs as described in Section 1 .
